      • KUBERNETES_RESOURCE_REQUEST_MODE

        public static final java.lang.String KUBERNETES_RESOURCE_REQUEST_MODE
        This config item is used to determine how to configure the K8s Resource Request. The format of this flag is the string encoded values of the underlying KubernetesRequestMode value.

      • getVolumesFromCLIDisabled

      • getVolumeConfigs

        protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<KubernetesConstants.VolumeConfigKeys,​java.lang.String>> getVolumeConfigs​(Config config,
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String prefix,
                                                                                                                                                   boolean isExecutor)
        Collects parameters form the CLI and generates a mapping between Volumes and their configuration key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        config - Contains the configuration options collected from the CLI.
        prefix - Configuration key to lookup for options.
        isExecutor - Flag used to switch CLI commands for the Executor and Manager.
        Returns:
        A mapping between Volumes and their configuration key-value pairs. Will return an empty list if there are no Volume Claim Templates to be generated.

      • getVolumeClaimTemplates

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<KubernetesConstants.VolumeConfigKeys,​java.lang.String>> getVolumeClaimTemplates​(Config config,
                                                                                                                                                       boolean isExecutor)
        Collects parameters form the CLI and validates options for PVCs.
        Parameters:
        config - Contains the configuration options collected from the CLI.
        isExecutor - Flag used to collect CLI commands for the Executor and Manager.
        Returns:
        A mapping between Volumes and their configuration key-value pairs. Will return an empty list if there are no Volume Claim Templates to be generated.

      • getVolumeEmptyDir

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<KubernetesConstants.VolumeConfigKeys,​java.lang.String>> getVolumeEmptyDir​(Config config,
                                                                                                                                                 boolean isExecutor)
        Collects parameters form the CLI and validates options for Empty Directorys.
        Parameters:
        config - Contains the configuration options collected from the CLI.
        isExecutor - Flag used to collect CLI commands for the Executor and Manager.
        Returns:
        A mapping between Volumes and their configuration key-value pairs. Will return an empty list if there are no Volume Claim Templates to be generated.
